existing_features.title: Create a frontend form to log new calorie burn activities with inputs for activity name, calories burned, and duration
Display a list of all logged calorie burn activities showing activity name, calories burned, duration, and date/time
Show total calories burned across all logged activities
Design a clean, energetic visual theme with vibrant accent colors, modern typography, and a layout that emphasizes activity tracking and progress
Require users to authenticate with Internet Identity before accessing any functionality in the app
Create a frontend form component to allow users to set their daily calorie burn goal with input validation
Display the user's current daily calorie burn goal in the dashboard summary section

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store calorie burn activities with fields for activity name, calories burned, duration in minutes, and timestamp
Implement backend functions to add new calorie burn activities and retrieve all activities for the current user
Add user authentication and login requirement
Store calorie burn activities per-user in the backend so each authenticated user sees only their own data
Add ability to set daily calorie burn goals
Add a backend function to set a daily calorie burn goal (numeric value) for the authenticated user
Add a backend function to retrieve the current daily calorie burn goal for the authenticated user
